tool_description: Get detailed data on tens of thousands of vehicle models from dozens of automakers. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/cars.
name: Cars by API-Ninjas
title: Cars by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/cars

optional_parameters.name: max_city_mpg
optional_parameters.description: Maximum city fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.

optional_parameters.name: min_comb_mpg
optional_parameters.description: Minimum combination (city + highway) fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.

optional_parameters.name: max_hwy_mpg
optional_parameters.description: Maximum highway fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.

optional_parameters.name: fuel_type
optional_parameters.description: Type of fuel used. Possible values: **gas**, **diesel**, **electricity**

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: How many results to return. Must be between **1** and **30**. Default is **5**

optional_parameters.name: drive
optional_parameters.description: Drive transmission. Possible values: **fwd** (front-wheel drive), **rwd** (rear-wheel drive), **awd** (all-wheel drive), **4wd** (four-wheel drive)

optional_parameters.name: max_comb_mpg
optional_parameters.description: Maximum combination (city + highway) fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.

optional_parameters.name: min_hwy_mpg
optional_parameters.description: Minimum highway fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.

optional_parameters.name: min_city_mpg
optional_parameters.description: Minimum City fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.
